name: Crazy Bee Balloons
description:
Watch out! Crazy bee is on the loose!
Crazy Bee Balloons is a game about a crazy bee who likes to pop balloons. Help her pop as many balloons as you can. Be quick, time is ticking. It will be even more difficult when you go to the next level. Easy to learn, hard to master.
Many levels to play. Share with your friends and compete with each other on Game Center.
Have fun! Highly addicting game!
